sources.title: The Man from Guntown (1935) TIM McCOY
sources.description:
Stars: Tim McCoy, Billie Seward, Wheeler Oakman
Director: Ford Beebe

When Tim Hanlon arrives to tell Ruth McArthur her long-lost brother has been killed, she mistakes him for her sibling. He stays on to help her retain control of the dam her father started. But a murderous villain is after the dam, and he now sends his man after Tim.

metadata.Plot: When Tim Hanlon arrives to tell Ruth McArthur her long lost brother has been killed, she mistakes him for her brother. He stays on to help her retain control of the dam her farther started. But DeLong is after the dam and having had McArthur killed, he now sends his man after Tim.
metadata.Writer: Ford Beebe, Thomas H. Ince Jr.
metadata.Actors: Tim McCoy, Billie Seward, Wheeler Oakman
